location_notes: Identification/Capacity plate in operator compartment/cowl area; record serial exactly as shown; additional serials for engine/transmission listed in manual.
Name/serial plate near operator console; verify against chassis/frame stamped serial if plate is missing.
Serial/Name plate by operator seat/battery cover area; see 'Serial Number Locations' in B-series O&M; stamped serial on frame/battery compartment.
Serial plate on operator console/chassis area; verify frame stamp if plate unreadable.
